text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In denen Thurneysischen Buchläden allhier, seynd dato folgende zwey Bücher zu haben, so in Nancy durch Sübscriptiones gedruckt worden. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionnaire Universel- Francois & Latin, Vulgairement appellé Dictionaire de Trevoux</TITLE>, avec des Remarques d Erudition & de Critique <VOLUME>5. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>; davon die 3. ersten Tom. dato schon zu beziehen sind; das gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht <PRICE>fl. 24</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Oeconomique, continant les moyens d'Augmenter son dien & de conserver sa sante</TITLE>, par <AUTHOR>Mister Noel Chomel</AUTHOR>, Augmente dun Nouveau Supplement de deur Volumes, par <AUTHOR>F. Marset, Doct. en Medecines</AUTHOR>. <FORMAT>Avec fig.</FORMAT> <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>; davon der erste Tomus dato bey ihnen zu beziehen ist; diß gantze Werck kostet samt der Fracht <PRICE>fl. 18</PRICE></BIBL>. So dann sind bey ihnen auch genugsam annoch zu haben: <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Historique & Critique de Mr. Bayle</TITLE>. <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE> <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. à <PRICE>fl. 27</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Corpus Juris Civilis Romani, cum Notis Gotofredi</TITLE> <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1740</YEAR>. à <PRICE>fl. 10. 48. xr.</PRICE></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Dictionaire Royal, Francois-Allemand-Latin, par le R. P. Fr. Pomey</TITLE> <VOLUME>3. Voll.</VOLUME> <FORMAT>4°.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1741</YEAR>. à <PRICE>fl. 5. 24. xr.</PRICE></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":17,"explanation":"Fixed corrupted characters and inconsistent XML tags: 1) Corrected 'Buchl√§den' to 'Buchläden', 2) Fixed 'B√ºcher' to 'Bücher', 3) Fixed 'S√ºbscriptiones' to 'Sübscriptiones', 4) Fixed 'appell√©' to 'appellé', 5) Changed inconsistent PRIZE tags to PRICE tags throughout (5 occurrences), 6) Fixed '2vec fig.' to 'Avec fig.', 7) Fixed 'di√ü' to 'diß', 8) Added missing period after 'Bayle' title, 9) Fixed 'Gotofrest' to 'Gotofredi', 10) Fixed '√†' symbols to 'à' (meaning 'at' for price), 11) Fixed 'L. 27' to 'fl. 27' for consistency, 12) Fixed '4√≤' to '4°' (quarto format), 13) Closed unclosed PRICE tag at the end."}
